positive_examples: This is an example of biological weapon research facility.
The biological weapon research facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed biological weapon research facility in this context.
A typical case of biological weapon research facility would involve these features.
The concept of biological weapon research facility applies here.
A facility focused on research and development of biological agents for weapons purposes.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon research facility, not biological weapon research facility.
This represents w m d weapons research facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponResearchFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsResearchFacility

definition: A facility conducting research on biological agents for weaponization.
